item.title: UnitedHealthcare CEO shooting latest: NYPD detectives follow leads to Atlanta
item.description: NYPD detectives arrived in Atlanta on Saturday as they probed leads in the shooting of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson in New York.

item.title: Syria updates: Assad regime appears to have fallen
item.description: Rebel forces in Syria said they have captured four cities in the past 24 hours and were advancing on the capital Damascus.

item.title: Trump doubles down on support for Pete Hegseth, admits he's unsure he'll be confirmed
item.description: Trump doubles down on support for Hegseth, admits he hasn’t gotten assurances from senators he’ll be confirmed

item.title: Far-right influencer Nick Fuentes accused of pepper spraying woman
item.description: Far-right influencer Nick Fuentes is due in court later this month.
